fields.name: group
fields.description: Arbitrary group record fetched by id.

fields.name: user
fields.description: Arbitrary user record fetched by slug, typeable_id, or uuid

types.name: Viewer
types.description: Root query container for multi-arg roots.

fields.name: groupSearch
fields.description: Users matching the given query sting within a particular group. Limits maximum results per request to 100. Custom order predicates are not supported at this time. For forward pagination, supply q, first, and after. For backward pagination, supply q, last, and before.

args.name: uuid
args.description: UUID of group to search within.

args.name: first
args.description: Take first n results. Should not be used in conjunction with last.

args.name: last
args.description: Take last n results. Should not be used in conjunction with first.

args.name: after
args.description: [Cursor] Get results after a given cursor from another node. Use with first.

args.name: before
args.description: [Cursor] Get results before a given cursor from another node. Use with last.

fields.name: search
fields.description: Users matching the given query sting. Limits maximum results per request to 100. Custom order predicates are not supported at this time. For forward pagination, supply q, first, and after. For backward pagination, supply q, last, and before.

args.name: first
args.description: Take first n results. Should not be used in conjunction with last.

args.name: last
args.description: Take last n results. Should not be used in conjunction with first.

args.name: after
args.description: [Cursor] Get results after a given cursor from another node. Use with first.

args.name: before
args.description: [Cursor] Get results before a given cursor from another node. Use with last.

fields.name: iconName
fields.description: Name of font awesome icon to use.

fields.name: searchText
fields.description: Actual query to be made upon clicking.

fields.name: displayText
fields.description: What to show in the list to the user.

types.name: UserSearchResultEdge
types.description: User edge type for use with search results.

fields.name: slug
fields.description: Unique slug for url based on name

fields.name: typeableId
fields.description: Unique identifier for use in private URL for users.

fields.name: publicShoutoutsEnabled
fields.description: The users preference for displaying their shoutouts.

fields.name: publicProfileEnabled
fields.description: The users preference for displaying their profile publicly.

fields.name: myStory
fields.description: Portfolio to show at the top of the user's profile

fields.name: isStudent
fields.description: Whether or not this user is a student.

fields.name: shoutouts
fields.description: Shoutouts that have been given to this user.

fields.name: socket
fields.description: Where to place this item within it's portfolio.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: Time this entry was last updated.

fields.name: mediaItem
fields.description: The Video, Photo, or Document associated with this placement

types.name: MediaItemEnum
types.description: A media item that lives within a placement.

enumValues.name: Video
enumValues.description: A video that lives within a placement.

enumValues.name: Photo
enumValues.description: A photo that lives within a placement.

enumValues.name: Document
enumValues.description: A document that lives within a placement.

types.name: MediaItem
types.description: Photo, document, or video for a placement.

types.name: MediaItemMetadata
types.description: Metadata object that references a MediaItem

fields.name: photo
fields.description: The image to render for this ad

fields.name: destUrl
fields.description: The url to redirect to when this ad is clicked

fields.name: uuid
fields.description: UUIDv4 unique identifier for this group.

fields.name: colorTheme
fields.description: This group's theme color as a HEX color code.

fields.name: memberCount
fields.description: The number of members in the group.

types.name: BadgeType
types.description: A type of badge that can be earned.

fields.name: optional
fields.description: Will be true if badge isn't necessary for profile completion

fields.name: studentDesc
fields.description: Description to be shown to Students

fields.name: admissionsrepDesc
fields.description: Description to be shown to Admissions Reps.

fields.name: buttonText
fields.description: Button Text to inform user how to earn the badge

fields.name: congrats
fields.description: Message to show to user upon completion

types.name: ShoutoutType
types.description: Type of Shoutouts that can be given

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The query root of this schema

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: The mutation root of this schema

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: The subscription root of this schema

types.name: __Type
types.description: A type in the GraphQL schema

fields.name: fields
fields.description: List of fields on this object

fields.name: ofType
fields.description: The modified type of this type

fields.name: possibleTypes
fields.description: Types which compose this Union or Interface

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: The kinds of types in this GraphQL system

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for accessing this field

fields.name: type
fields.description: The return type of this field

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: An input for a field or InputObject

fields.name: description
fields.description: What this value is used for

fields.name: type
fields.description: The expected type for this value

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: The value applied if no other value is provided

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: A possible value for an Enum

types.name: __Directive
types.description: A query directive in this schema

fields.name: onOperation
fields.description: Does this directive apply to operations?

fields.name: onFragment
fields.description: Does this directive apply to fragments?

fields.name: onField
fields.description: Does this directive apply to fields?

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Ignore this part of the query if `if` is true

directives.name: include
directives.description: Include this part of the query if `if` is true
